categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Enarc system was a star system located in the Mid Rim containing the planet Enarc. It was one of the endpoints of a hyperlane named after it, the Enarc Run. The system was the original location of a medcenter that was eventually moved to the Kaliida Nebula and renamed Kaliida Shoals Medical Center.

In 32 BBY, the system played a role in the Blockade of Naboo. A Trade Federation vessel at the edges of the Naboo system warned inbound vessels against trading with the system. The vessel offered to purchase cargo bound for the Naboo system and replace it with outbound cargo, directing all interested parties to the Trade Federation distribution center located in the Enarc system.
